subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The injury-riddled Yankees, widely expected to struggle at the season’s start, are 17-10, thanks in part to the coaches’ in-game adjustments and work with players in the video room.
snippet: The injury-riddled Yankees, widely expected to struggle at the season’s start, are 17-10, thanks in part to the coaches’ in-game adjustments and work with players in the video room.
